Name: Medicinal Herbs - Cannabis Grow Simulator
About the game: Do you have a green thumb and always wanted to grow Cannabis? With Medicinal Herbs you can virtually simulate the cultivation. Make the finest medical Cannabis for your patients. From simple cellars to professional cultivation, everything is possible. Detailed growth of plants, temperature dependencies and much more. Build your own professional medical cannabis farm and help your customers get their medical problems under control. ______________________________________________________________________________ Early Access: Complete tasks to grow your business and make your customers happy. Grow in 5 different sized rooms . Buy and sell items . Process your cannabis products in several steps . Sell ​​your medicine in your shop and help your customers. Choose your favorite strain from different cannabis strains . Use growing boxes from small to large. Show your skills and create mother plants . Use one of the many items to perfect your cultivation. Keep a close eye on the advanced simulation . (Water consumption, Power consumption, temperature, humidity, and more... Or buy automated systems to simplify your cultivation. Release: Be a master and create your own variety by crossing . Exchange your old things and seeds online with other players. Hire employees for your many shops and take care of them. Automate the entire process. Use your skills outside as well.
